_sText: I needed a torch for a mapping project and did not like the one prefab I could find, so I made my own. Includes torch, torch wall holder and all the flame/lighting entities to go with it. Note: The map I created this for can be found here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/105481 ------------------------------------ UPDATE: I have added a small light beneath the torch to diffuse the hard shadows to a point where they are much more realistic. Special thanks to my friend WarKry for this idea. UPDATE 2: New images are up.
